name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 15, it was reported online that a student of Baicheng Medical College had a heart attack and fainted on the playground during morning exercises last Friday, but the on-site counselor failed to take timely rescue measures, which delayed the rescue opportunity and led to the student's death.
According to the online description, the counselor had previously asked the student to send fish to his family, but because the fish was not alive, he began to target the student. Later, when the student asked for leave due to congenital heart disease, he was rejected by the counselor, who said that he was pretending. When the tragedy finally happened, the necessary first aid measures were not taken immediately.
According to students of this school, when the ambulance came, the person had not breathed for 9 minutes, and there were medical students at the scene, but the teacher did not allow the students to perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation on him.
On the morning of the 15th, the family went to the school to defend their rights, and the police took away the portrait during the period. The school pushed the responsibility to the students for staying up late and planned to compensate 100,000 yuan.
This incident aroused the indignation of students and netizens.
Although the school threatened the students with expulsion and non-issuance of graduation certificates...
fullContent:
4月15日，网传白城医学高等专科学院一名学生上周五早操时心脏病发作晕倒在操场，但现场辅导员未及时采取施救措施延误了抢救时机导致学生死亡。
根据网传描述，此前辅导员曾让该学生给自己家属送鱼，但因为鱼不是活的导致其开始针对这名学生。之后学生因先天心脏病请假时遭到其拒绝，称其是装的。最后发生悲剧时亦没有立即采取必要的急救措施。
据本校学生称，救护车来的时候人已经没有呼吸9分钟了，且现场都是学医的，但老师不让学生们对其进行心脏复苏。
15日上午，家属前往学校维权，期间被警察抢走遗像。学校则将责任推给学生熬夜，计划赔偿10万元。
这一事件引发了学生以及网友们的愤慨。
尽管学校以开除和不发毕业证要挟学生禁止外传，但是学生和网友们依然将事情在网上接力转发。
同时，大量的网友前往女生社交媒体主页留言悼念。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is common to see petitioners being captured by interception officers in Beijing. It is the first time that petitioners have captured interception officers in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A tour guide on Xiaohongshu said that someone in his foreign tour group was surrounded by police because he stood upside down in Tiananmen Square, and he deleted the photo and left a message to accept criticism and education...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the official Douyin account of Yilin was denounced by the public.
Because Yilin often published articles more than a decade ago such as "Australian flies can collect honey, Japanese toilet water can be drunk after seven flushes, the United States has a nationwide power outage to save sparrows, and oil paper bags in German sewers", it is now being mocked by self-media and netizens for worshipping foreign things.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ironically, the school was selected as one of the second batch of national first aid education pilot schools a few months ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 14, CCTV revealed that a staff member of a confidential scientific research unit was notified to wait for work during the last elimination of the unit reform, so he sold out core secrets and was eventually executed.
This news has aroused the empathy of many netizens. They questioned why people who hold core secrets would be eliminated last.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, in Foshan, Guangdong, an old employee who had worked at the Ounuo Door and Window Factory for more than ten years suddenly fainted while working. Factory staff rushed to the ward and forced the unconscious employee to put his fingerprints on the contract. It is said that the factory has not paid social security for him for more than ten years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 14 (Released) Shanghai. A "mini coffin room" sparked heated discussions among netizens. The room in the video is actually a renovated room under the stairs, and the layout is suffocating. The video poster said that the house is about 5 square meters and the monthly rent is 300 yuan. It was rented by an online car-hailing driver on the day the video was released.
Netizens commented: "After working like a cow and a horse all day, there is no place to hang yourself when you come back"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, in Zibo, Shandong, Lijin Group investors knelt outside the Zibo Municipal Government to defend their rights, and there was a lot of crying at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 13, Lijin Group announced the six-year repayment details and annual repayment ratio. The outstanding debt will be gradually repaid within five years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, Shenzhen, Dongguan and other places launched a large-scale campaign to regulate electric vehicles. On that day, a large number of pictures of food delivery boys being arrested and fined appeared on social media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, the Douban rating and short review areas of the Netflix version of "The Three-Body Problem" were all cleared, and any rating, comment, or sharing operations are currently no longer possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 14 (Released) Taizhou, Zhejiang. The video shows that in a fruit store, a man was emotional and threw the goods out of the store with a kitchen knife. The police stood by with guns.
On the 15th, the Tiantai County Public Security Bureau issued a notice that a man named Chu threatened a clerk with a kitchen knife after a dispute with a fruit store clerk. During the on-site handling of the police, Chu refused to cooperate and bit and scratched the police. At present, Chu has been detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, Maoyibei's stores announced the cessation of operations

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 15, Dalian, Liaoning. A netizen posted a video saying that his 71-year-old father hanged himself after being dismissed by Xinshunda Property Company. The property company expressed its willingness to compensate 10,000 yuan. Before the old man committed suicide, he left three suicide notes, one of which read, "I was forced to do this by you. Manager, squad leader, you are not human." The netizen also posted his father's discharge certificate before his death. Afterwards, the netizen said in an interview that "the property squad leader directly told my father, Lao Zhang, don't come tomorrow. You can't even sweep the floor clean. What else can you do? Just go home and pick up rags." After returning home, the father was depressed and hanged himself in the property office at 5 am on April 10. The property company expressed its willingness to compensate 10,000 yuan. The manager of the property company said that the cleaning was dismissed because of poor work. It is impossible to pay much money if he hanged himself a week later. At present, the father's body is still stored in the funeral home.
